content.name: iscsiNode
content.description:
Information about the iSCSI nodes in the storage system. An iSCSI node represents a single iSCSI initiator or target.
iSCSI nodes are created automatically on every non-aggregated Ethernet port except of ports used for management access.

attributes.name: alias
attributes.description: Descriptive name of the iSCSI node. This name does not have to be unique.

attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the iscsiNode instance.

attributes.name: ethernetPort
attributes.description: Ethernet port associated with the iSCSI Node. (Each Ethernet port  can be associated with one iSCSI node.)

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the iscsiNode instance.
